vote.title: To Honor, Recognize, and Celebrate the life of Kathleen L. Morris.
vote.description:
Title
To Honor, Recognize, and Celebrate the life of Kathleen L. Morris.
 
Body
WHEREAS, Kathleen L. Morris was born on January 9, 1961 in Etna, Ohio. She was a graduate of Gahanna Lincoln High School Class of 1979 and a proud Veteran of the U.S. Air Force; and
 
WHEREAS, Kathleen was a dedicated service member of the City of Columbus working as a 911 Communications officer for the Columbus Police Department. Her coworkers appreciated her compassion and efforts to help every person she spoke with during their time of need; and
 
WHEREAS, Kathleen loved many activities including reading, watching old movies and spending time with her much loved dog Lucky. She was an avid sports fan and appreciated music of all kinds; and
 
WHEREAS, family was important to Kathleen. She was a beloved partner, daughter, sister, niece, and aunt; and
 
WHEREAS, a cherished friend to many, Kathleen L. Morris will be missed by all who knew her; now, therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
That this Council does hereby share our deepest condolences with the Morris family and honor, recognize, and celebrate the life of Kathleen L. Morris.
